title: Public and Nonprofit Finance
ziele: Students gain a focused overview of the managerial problems in public administrations, public enterprises and nonprofit organizations.
lehrinhalte:
• Financing as a managerial function
  • Financial resources of public administrations and public enterprises
  • Financial resources of nonprofit organizations

literatur: Schauer, Reinbert, Öffentliche Betriebswirtschaftslehre – Public Management, 2. Auflage, Wien 2010; additional course materials
